example.eg: The pub restricted smoking to the beer garden and asked customers not to bring lighted cigarettes indoors.
There are laws that restrict the sale of alcohol and tobacco products.
Brian restricts his working hours to ensure he has time to spend with his family.
Teresa restricts the time her kids spend watching TV to two hours a day.
example.egtrans: 特丽莎把孩子们看电视的时间限制在每天2小时。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…限制在, 把…控制在

example.eg: The plan is that violent prisoners will be restricted to their cells.
example.egtrans: 根据计划，行为暴力的犯人将被拘禁在自己的囚室中。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将…拘禁在, 将…局限于

example.eg: If you restrict yourself to only eating at mealtimes you may actually lose weight.
